name: audit_fields
description: Validates that DTOs include standard audit fields (createdBy, createdTime, updatedBy, updatedTime) as per ADR

conditions.message: DTOs must include 'createdBy' field to track the user ID that created the entity
DTOs must include 'createdTime' field in ISO 8601 format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z')
DTOs must include 'updatedBy' field to track the user ID that last modified the entity
DTOs must include 'updatedTime' field in ISO 8601 format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z')
